title: Analytics Platform
subtitle: Advanced data analytics platform
description: Real-time data processing with Go microservices, PostgreSQL, and React dashboards deployed on Kubernetes

content.overview: The Analytics Platform is a modern solution in the field of business intelligence and data analysis.
content.challenge: Companies generate increasingly large amounts of data that are difficult to manage and analyze.
content.solution: A scalable platform that automates data processing and provides interactive visualizations.

features.title: High-performance processing
features.description: Millisecond response times for large datasets
